body: Hi guys! I tried to use the Butterfly, but it showed an error which is "Solution exception:In order to run OpenFOAM using butterfly you must use an admin account or run the program as administrator." I'm sure that my account has the administrator authority and I run OpenFOAM as administrator. Anyone knows how to solve this problem? Any help will be appreciated.
topic: A problem about run OpenFOAM as administrator

replies.body: You have to run Rhino as an administrator too, did you try that?
